column5: Two bedroom, two full bath mobile home with walk in closets. This is a gated resort community, with full time security. The master bedroom has a queen sized bed, and the second bedroom has a queen sized futon bed. Very open and light, with a wonderful back yard that is full of birds. This home is in a five star resort which offers three heated swimming pools, a hot tub, tennis courts, shuffleboard, a golf chipping range, a sauna, and a clubhouse with planned activities.
